name: Angolmore
effect:
Angolmore is strength +1 for each other monster in its fight.
Find it at [Theta] Bitter, Fantasy, Mirror World.
To Play/To Flip: Spot 4 wounded PCs.
Reward: No reward.

name: Astro Prince
effect:
Storable- may attack when your alien or drain monster attacks.
It's the one that shoots back.
To Play/ To Flip: No requirements.
Reward: Do not reconcile your hand on your next turn.

name: Black Death
effect:
To Play: Spot 6 monsters, each of a different element
Reward: Sacrifice any number of cards. Reveal that many cards from the top of your deck. You may play any monsters revealed.

name: Dark Asteroid
effect:
Sometimes they get really big.
To Play/To Flip: Sacrifice 3 PCs.
Reward: Sacrifice a monster to perform its reward. You may perform this reward an additional time.

name: Gate Hacking
effect:
Place a card from outside the game in your discard pile.
Gate hacking allows the user to enter and explore protected areas.
To Play/To Flip: Spend 1 Level Up card.

name: Ginkan
effect:
Ginkan draws 1 fewer destiny when fighting more than 1 monster.
Sometimes called the Silver Knight, he leads the Crimson Knights.

name: Girl in White
effect:
Play an item from your discard pile. When you draw this card for destiny, you may remove it from the game to play up to 2 items from your discard pile on the same PC.
T+/%e i, ^o time. Ple}se. Hel? 3e.

name: Goil Menhir
effect:
On the turn this idol attacks, a monster in your portal may attack, is strength +3, and may perform its reward an additional time.
To Play/To Flip: Spot 3 of your PCs, each bearing an item.
Reward: No reward.

name: Hidden, Forbidden, Holy Ground
effect:
Fields and monsters cannot be played. At the start of any player’s turn, that player may return 2 of his or her hidden cards to hand to destroy this field.
A sanctuary of secrets.
To Play/To Flip: Spend 2 Level Up cards.

name: Kaochin
effect:
When you play Kaochin, you may log out a PC.
Well, the Subaru style is really popular now. I hate it when they say I copied the look.

name: Mu Guardian
effect:
Steel animated by a spirit, it blasts everything it encounters.
To Play/To Flip: Sacrifice 3 cards.
Reward: Opponent sacrifices 2 cards.

name: Net Slum
effect:
Begin a .hack//ENEMY SUBGAME, using players' discard piles as their decks. Play to 2 victory points. Afterwards, transfer all scored monsters from the subgame to the main game, and return all other cards to their owners' discard piles.

To Play: Spend 2 Level Up cards.

name: Puchi 2.0
effect:
Puchi is strength +2 when you have a size 5 grunty.
To Play: Discard 2 cards of the same element OR replace any Puchi
